lom:description.lom:string: This tutorial is part of MAST (Materials Science and Technology Teacher's Workshop) a project of the Materials Science and Engineering Department at the University of Illinois. The site is geared towards high school teachers and students and provides background knowledge of the topic. The following areas are covered: what are ceramics; histortoric timeline; future trends; scientific principles (atomic bonding, classification, thermal properties, optical properties, mechanical properties, electrical properties, ceramic processing); laboratory activities; a quiz; a glossary; and videos.

lom:title.lom:string: Materials Science and Technology Teacher's Workshop
